name: Neunid
description:
A submission for Whitevault's annual Vault Jam!

A simple Digital Pet Simulator game. The goal is to grow by moving your creature towards food, getting lots of rest and keeping them happy. There are three main creature lines your creature can grow into - a bug, a plant or an animal! From there, they can become up to 21+ new creatures!

Use the 'Arrow keys' to move your creature.

Press 'R' to make your creature take a rest.

Hold down 'F2' for a hard reset and start with a new creature.

Art and coding by [noblelemon]: https://twitter.com/thenoblestlemon

Environment sprites by Reignited Inferno: https://twitter.com/TheTrueIgni

I also just want to take a moment to thank Whitevault for putting on this jam, it was fun to finally participate and he does wonderful work as a game-dev and pixel artist.

Follow Whitevault here: https://www.twitch.tv/whitevault
